title: Rehabbed 1 Bed Timber Lofts w/ High Ceilings, Laundry in Unit, Garage
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Several One Bed Layouts Available Now!
These timber lofts have original warehouse features, exposed brick, high ceilings, laundry in unit and lofted bedroom.
Take a virtual tour of '04 Layout here: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=xdaSWhQYSHJ
Pricing fluctuates daily and is also based on move date and lease length.
Price quoted is for immediate move in.
Please inquiry for current pricing for your move date.

Spacious and sun-filled, the Carriage House Lofts is a pet-friendly community that features renovated, loft-style apartments with open floor plans, updated kitchens with stainless steel appliances and islands, in-home washers and dryers, large windows, exposed brick, and hardwood floors.
The Chicago South Loop views from our apartment homes are stunning.
The South Loop is known for its buzzing redevelopment, world-class museums and stunning skyline views.
The Carriage House Lofts is steps from the best of South Loop dining, shopping and nightlife, as well as the Red, Blue and Green Line.
It's super convenient for those who work in the Loop or want to enjoy all that Grant Park and Museum Campus has to offer.
Special: $99 covers all applicants for the unit and the move-in fee.
Parking: $150 for a single garage space.
$250 for a tandem garage space (fits two cars, one in front of the other)
- Comments: One-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per apartment and a monthly pet rent of $30 per pet.
